dishes.name: Marinara Pizza
dishes.description: Classic tomato sauce, locally grown basil, and fresh garlic on our signature sourdough crust

translations.en: Inspired by her first visit to an Italian market, Chef Adriana crafts this dish with passion and authenticity, using techniques passed down through generations.
translations.es: Inspirada por su primera visita a un mercado italiano, la Chef Adriana elabora este plato con pasión y autenticidad, utilizando técnicas transmitidas de generación en generación.
translations.fr: Inspirée par sa première visite d'un marché italien, la Chef Adriana réalise ce plat avec passion et authenticité, en utilisant des techniques transmises de génération en génération.

dishes.chef_anecdote: I still remember the vibrant colors of fresh basil at my first market visit in Naples. The aroma transported me instantly, and I knew I had to capture that feeling in a dish.
dishes.culinary_philosophy: At Zest, every dish is a tribute to the art of cooking, where local ingredients meet timeless Italian techniques. Our pizzas honor simplicity and quality above all.

translations.en: Summer brings the most vibrant tomatoes and fragrant basil to our kitchen. Each ingredient reaches its peak flavor during these warm months, creating a harmony of taste that's unmistakably summer in California.
translations.es: El verano trae los tomates más vibrantes y la albahaca más fragante a nuestra cocina. Cada ingrediente alcanza su máximo sabor durante estos meses cálidos, creando una armonía de sabores que es inconfundiblemente verano en California.

translations.en: The Marinara pizza dates back to 18th century Naples, where it was prepared for sailors returning from sea. Its simplicity celebrates the essential flavors of Italian cuisine.
translations.it: La pizza Marinara risale alla Napoli del XVIII secolo, dove veniva preparata per i marinai che tornavano dal mare. La sua semplicità celebra i sapori essenziali della cucina italiana.

translations.en: Our tomatoes are hand-picked at peak ripeness from Sonoma Valley Farms, just 15 miles from our kitchen. The volcanic soil there imparts a distinctive sweetness that forms the foundation of our sauce.

dishes.sustainability_impact: Sourcing locally reduces our carbon footprint by 30% compared to standard supply chains. Our partnership with Sonoma Valley Farms supports regenerative agriculture practices.

upgrade_options.marketing_copy: Experience the luxurious twist with black truffle oil and aged Parmigiano—an upgrade that celebrates local flavor with a touch of indulgence.
Our plant-based version replaces traditional cheese with our house-made cashew ricotta, delivering all the flavor with none of the dairy.

lto_details.marketing_copy: Limited Time: Try our exclusive Truffle Marinara this week only! Made with rare black truffles from our partner farm.

dishes.customer_feedback_summary: 92% positive reviews – consistently mentioned as the most authentic Neapolitan-style pizza in Sonoma!
dishes.suggested_prompt_template: Create a {social_media|menu|website} description for our {dish.name}, highlighting the {ingredient_story} and {chef_story}. Include details about our {supplier_location.compact} sourcing and {sustainability_impact}.

translations.en: These vibrant heirloom tomatoes are grown in rich volcanic soil, creating a naturally sweet flavor profile that's the foundation of our signature sauce. The farm uses traditional growing methods with zero pesticides.

bundles.bundle_marketing_copy: Discover the ultimate taste of Zest with our curated date night bundle—perfect for sharing! Enjoy our signature Marinara Pizza paired with a garden-fresh salad and a bottle of locally produced wine from Sonoma Valley vineyards.
